required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparing Biofinity Toric Multifocal to Ultra Multifocal for Astigmatism
clinical_study.official_title: Comparing Biofinity Toric Multifocal to Ultra Multifocal for Astigmatism

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of the study is to compare the handling and performance of Biofinity Toric Multifocal to Ultra Multifocal for Astigmatism.

detailed_description.textblock: The objective of the study is to compare the handling and performance of Biofinity Toric Multifocal to Ultra Multifocal for Astigmatism. This is a prospective, randomized, participant masked, crossover, bilateral dispensing study.

primary_outcome.description: Subjective at-home ratings of lens handling for insertion, using a 0-10 scale (0-Very difficult, 10 - Very easy).

arm_group.description: Subjects were randomized to wear comfilcon A for one month then Samfilcon A for one month in this randomized, bilateral cross-over study.
Subjects were randomized to wear samfilcon A for one month then comfilcon A for one month in this randomized, bilateral cross-over study.

intervention.description: Subjects will be randomized to wear comfilcon A for one month.
Subjects will be randomized to wear samfilcon A for one month.

overall_contact.last_name: Jose A. Vega, O.D., MSc., FAAO
